overview.heading: Selecting Right People
overview.description: Do understand the roles various professionals play, and their specialised skills and expertise when assembling a team for home building. Identifying reputable and experienced professionals with a proven track record of delivering quality work and excellent customer service is crucial, as the right team will ensure a successful and smooth construction process. Take your time, ask relevant questions, and make an informed decision based on your specific needs and preferences.

cards.heading: Quality Parameters as per BIS

data.heading: The Right Engineer
data.description: An engineer ensures that your home's structure is safe, sound, and capable of withstanding various loads and environmental factors. They analyse the architectural plans and provide recommendations and calculations for the foundation, framing, and other structural elements.

fields.listHeading: Some aspects to consider as you put your dream team together:

list.heading: Evaluate Expertise
list.description: Review past projects of potential team members to assess their capabilities and expertise. Visit completed projects or request references...
